body_content.explanation: having a very thin edge or point that can cut something or make a hole in something easily:
examples: The tool has an ultra-sharp blade that zests perfectly and grates big piles of cheese with no effort.
Be careful with the saw blades because they're ultrasharp.

body_content.explanation: very clear and easy to see or understand:
examples: Our new digital television allows us to watch the match with an ultrasharp high definition picture.
The way the two characters respond to a crisis bring their distinct personalities into ultra-sharp relief.
